screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .xcf.xz file in GIMP 3
screenshot.caption: XCF.XZ file open in GIMP 3

description: GIMP is an open-source raster graphics editor similar to Adobe Photoshop that photographers and illustrators may use. Users typically save images they create and edit with GIMP in the native XCF format, but they may also export images as compressed archives to reduce their size.
For example, users can export an XCF file as an archive compressed with XZ, bzip2, or gzip compression algorithms. To export an XCF file as an XCF.XZ file, follow these steps:
NOTE: XCF.XZ files may also be saved as .XCFXZ files.
